item.title: Help make this code
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

if (command.startsWith("emote") && playerRights >= 2) { try { int emote = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(6)); if (emote < 30000 && emote > 0) { pEmote = emote; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else { sM("Bad emote ID"); } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Bad emote ID"); } }

I want to make a command where when you type it, it does emote 5081, and increases one by one (EX, Character does 5081, then 5082, etc, etc.) However I donâ€™t know where to begin with that if someone could help me it would be appreciated :D.
